data.title: Ahmed Helmi

data.text:
1. Curriculum Vitae PERSONAL INFORMATION: FULL NAME: Ahmed Helmi El-Menshawy Ali Hussein El-Zawawy. DATE OF BIRTH: 14th of November, 1984 . BIRTH PLACE: Damietta, Egypt . HOME ADDRESS: House 84/2, Area 4, District 2, New Damietta City, Egypt . PHONE: +2057-2404036. MOBILE: +201001297412. E-MAIL: ahmad.zawawy@gmail.com zawawy3@hotmail.com MARITAL STATUS: Married. MILITARY STATUS: Exempted. Current Job: Drilling Fluid Eng. ( Mud Eng.) EDUCATION: - B. SC. Geology and Chemistry Department with Grade Good 72.36%, Mansoura University, Damietta Branch. - Graduation research: 1-Gology: Eocene in Egypt. Grade: Excellent. 2-Chemistry: Silicon. Grade: Excellent. Skills: Computer Skills: Have good skills & certificates in computer usage in :  MS-DOS, Operating System Windows98,Windows Me &Windows XP, Internet Fundamental and able to use Visual Basic & C++.  Microsoft Office & Computer Maintenance. Language Skills: Arabic : Mother Tongue. English : Fluent Writing ,Reading and Speaking. French : poor. Training - Participiting In Geological Field Trip To Eastern Desert (2005). - Trained in Faculty of Engineering, Chemisrty Department, Mansoura University . - Trained in Faculty of Science at Damietta Branch Geology Department, Mansoura University . - H2S Certification, Surviver, HUET Certification & HSE course. - Basic mudlogging course, advanced mudlogging course, Anax & dvanced Anax, GC-Tracer course and Hydraulics. - Basic Mud Engineering School. - PADI DiverMaster / Assissant Instructor Penguin Diving Center.

2. ACTIVITIES & WORK EXPERIENCE: --Drilling Fluid Engineering : - EMEC Company – Saudi Arabia: (Jan/2009 – July/2012). - OILSERV Company – Kurdistan / Iraq: (Sept/2012 – July/2014) - Optimum Engineering Company – Saudi Arabia: (Oct/2014 - Today) ---Mud Types: 1.Water Base Mud: • Spud Mud Flocculated With Lime. • High Bentonite Spud Mud • KCL Polymer Mud. • NaCl Polymer Mud. • Na & K Formate Mud • All Types of Brine Water as: (NaCl-CaCl2-KCL filtrated brine). • Completion Fluid as Inhibited Diesel, Inhibited Water. 2.Oil Base Mud: • 80:20 OBM. • 70:30 OBM. • 25:75 OBM. **Drilling Fluid Engineer tasks & responsibilities: 1. Preparing and supervising the drilling fluid properties during the drilling operation, and taking critical actions towards any interference to the drilling fluid. 2. Secure the company business onsite, with totally respect to the working policy. 3. Monitoring and testing of the drilling fluid, and reporting it day to day on site to the representative man on site with applying some recommendations that can improve the drilling operation. 4. Delivering a complete mud Rheology and Hydraulics calculation with the ability to Handel any explanations. 5. Complete awareness of formation damage handling, measurement and prevention and all mud related drilling problems, always ready to eliminate it in a professional way. **In addition to my duties; I'm responsible for training of new joined trainee colleagues on mud Engineering concepts, applications & techniques on well site.
